item.title: You've been using the HttpClient incorrectly
item.description:
Why we use the HttpClient incorrectly

The HttpClient is being misused as often as it is, because of two reasons:

  1. We’ve been taught to instantiate disposable objects in a using statement
  2. The majority of the tutorials teach us the wrong way
